body_html: As far as I understood it, it works when he uses strides (2, 2), which makes more sense to me, as using strides of (1,1) doubles the memory necessary to store the activations compared to strides of 2.

body: As far as I understood it, it works when he uses strides (2, 2), which makes more sense to me, as using strides of (1,1) doubles the memory necessary to store the activations compared to strides of 2.
